dataIdInfo.idPurp: Oklahoma House Districts drawn with the 2020 Census. These are the legislative districts for the Oklahoma House of Representatives for the elections in 2022 through 2030. 2021 HB 1001X creates the State House of Representatives Redistricting Act of 2021 to divide the state into 101 state House districts with roughly 39,202 people in each district.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
